content: On the evening of April 9, a fire broke out at Hubei Institute of Fine Arts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Speaking of supervisors exploiting graduate students, we have to mention the situation where supervisors let graduate students write textbooks. Many university textbooks in China are written by graduate students or even undergraduates, and professors and supervisors are just figureheads.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 10, a liquefied gas explosion occurred in Weimei Shangpin Qingyang Xiaozhu in Sujiatun District, Shenyang City, killing one person and injuring three others.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 9, in Hongta, Yuxi, Yunnan, garbage was piled up in front of a garbage station with no one to clean it up. It is reported that the sanitation workers have not received their wages for four months.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 10, a man walked on the streets of Dalian, holding up a loud speaker and shouting that the police had framed him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Friendship Radiation"
On April 10, CCTV reported the follow-up of the discovery of a radioactive source in the Russian Far East city of Khabarovsk, saying that in recent days, the continuous automatic monitoring results of Heilongjiang Province showed that the test results were at a normal level and no abnormalities were found.
Hu Xijin also wrote on the 9th that it seemed that the matter was not serious and had been resolved, and would not have any impact on the residents in China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/MjYtGlpqiQ

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 8, a patriotic blogger posted a receipt claiming that he had sent 20,000 yuan in living expenses to Yamagami Tetsuya, who assassinated former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, and hoped that he would return to society as soon as possible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 8, a video circulated online showed that an online car-hailing driver chose to refuse to pick up the passenger after learning that the passenger was Japanese.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 9, a clip from the Japanese animation "Giyikawa" was exposed saying "Taiwan is a good country", which triggered a boycott by domestic netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 9, the Netherlands Embassy in China released the "Foreign Correspondents' Club of China 2023 China Media Environment Report", but the link in the Weibo post was blocked by Sina on the grounds that "the link may have security risks", and the blog post could not be forwarded.
The report said that although China ended the population movement restrictions related to the new crown last year, there are still many obstacles for foreign journalists to report.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 10, at the entrance of the library at the North Campus of Northwest Agriculture and Forestry University, someone hung a banner on the door demanding salary.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 10, Qidong County, Hunan Province. Illegal mining and destruction of farmland in Baoliandong Village was stopped by villagers. Video shows that an old man sat in front of an excavator to stop the construction, and the villagers and township officials had a physical conflict.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 10, Liaocheng, Shandong. A Tesla crashed into the bridge guardrail at the gate of Liaocheng No. 1 Middle School. The video showed that a student was hit and a man was lying under the bridge. The traffic police said that the accident has been handled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 9, Hehe Shouchuang issued a notice to investors, announcing the collapse of its shares.
The notice stated, "Since the company and related enterprises' products have been unable to be redeemed upon maturity, a series of measures have been taken to remedy the situation, but the results have not been as expected. At present, the company and related enterprises are seriously insolvent, and there is a major risk of continued operation and they are unable to repay. The repayment work will be suspended from now on."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 9, in Baise City, Guangxi, the Napo Township government occupied villagers’ land for construction without their consent, sparking dissatisfaction among the villagers. On that day, the villagers gathered in front of the government and held banners to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/fv6nmdGRG5

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 10, many media outlets reported that "Women talk about high-quality leftover women who have just come to their senses and think it's good to marry in the countryside." In the video, a woman said that she is a 38-year-old "high-quality leftover woman" and that high-quality men of the same age look down on her, and that all those who pursue her are rural bachelors. "Old girls are the same as boys without money, and they don't contribute to marriage." "Now I think it's good to marry in the countryside."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 9, in Heilongjiang, a labor and personnel officer of Dahailin Forestry Bureau defrauded several elderly people of more than 10 million yuan under the pretext of helping them with retirement. On the same day, the elderly victims gathered outside the local court to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 10, Handan, Hebei. The Zhanghefu real estate project (formerly Binjiang Capital) has been unfinished for more than a decade. It was originally scheduled to be delivered on April 10, 2024, but on that day, the security guards blocked the door and prohibited the owners from entering, saying that they had to pay more.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On-site surveillance video

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 9, in Mei County, Shaanxi Province, retired kindergarten teachers went to the county government and the petition office to demand social security arrears.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 10, the media reported that a hotel owner in Zaoyang, Hubei was beaten by a public official from Fujian Province. The other party threatened that "the deputy mayor is at the same level as me" and "I will deal with him later." The next day, the owner received a call from the fire department.
On April 10, the local fire department said that the "retaliation" was not true.
According to the unit of the public official involved, Chen, a cadre of the Xiangyang Audit Bureau, three people went to the hotel to play mahjong when the incident happened. He has been severely criticized. The local government of Fuzhou gave the "intra-party warning" to the attacker Chang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 10, in Jinan, Shandong, residents blocked the road to prevent vehicles from passing through a cement factory next to their residential area that was supposed to be demolished four years ago and produced a large amount of dust every day and no one cared about it despite years of complaints.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 10, 15 graduate students from Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications collectively reported the protest in their real names and successfully.
That evening, the school issued a report on the situation
Zheng Feng's qualification as a graduate student tutor was revoked, her teaching work was stopped, and she was given administrative sanctions such as demotion. Party discipline sanctions will be carried out in accordance with procedures. The school will change tutors for all students, strengthen care and concern for students, provide psychological counseling for students, and do its best to ensure that students have a normal study and scientific research life.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of April 10, a pedestrian collision occurred on Huaqiangbei Street in Shenzhen. The driver was suspected of drunk driving.
